definition: (East Indian cookery) a pungent dish of vegetables or meats flavored with curry powder and usually eaten with rice, to give a neat appearance to
details:
noun
- (East Indian cookery) a pungent dish of vegetables or meats flavored with curry powder and usually eaten with rice
verb
- to give a neat appearance to
= synonyms: dress
- to treat by incorporating fat
= example: to treat by incorporating fat
- to season with a mixture of spices
